divs: sighting details hi, yesterday���(12-03-11) at around 6:30pm i was walking on the sidewalk and listing to music on my iphone and as am walking i looked at the sky and i seen something completely unnatural not what am use to seeing... there was four orange objects hovering\moving in slow motion.. one of them changed from orange to a reddish color and moved down and quietly, no noise at all, .. and then four of them flew quick high in the sky.... i right away turned off the music and turned on the camera on my iphone to recorded it... as i am looking at them, i heard a normal airplane\jet sound above me in the sky and i could barely see a normal airplane lights blinking (white+green) far high in the sky.. it was flying on the same direction as the 4 orange objects(which it looked like it was chasing the orang flying objects), and the four flying objects suddenly flew far till they disappeared. ... ��� location of seeing the ornage flying objects\���unidentified flying objects; i was walking on elm street toward buttonwood zoo in new bedford, mass..���
Summary: 4 orange colored objects and one of them changed to red color as it was hovering down then flew fast high to the sky
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in New Bedford
There were no other sightings in New Bedford on or around December 3rd 2011
